ABOUT

Hello fellow travellers,
My name is Sahil gurung From the beautiful city call Darjeeling. I am an offbeat traveller and photographer which keep a tryst of finding beautiful places to visit and eating outlets to satisfy my taste buds. I am there at Instagram with the name of ‘Sahil.21souls’, in case you want to search me. The beautiful places and awesome food sort of attracts me and thus I opened airbnb for the travellers like me. I love about travelling is discovering unique food culture & places that are untouched by tourist that each country/states offers.

One of the other factors which keeps me going and helps me in chasing my dream of travelling each and every part of the globe is photography. Taking and preserving pictures not only takes me back to my days of travelling but also provides a sudden escape to this monotonous life. Since now I am taking pictures for quite some time, I can definitely see that my own photographs have improved over the years. Although I am crisply aware that I still have to go a long way! I love to capture the atmosphere through my photos as a feast to the eyes of everyone who is looking at them!
